metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45985 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Lua 5.4.3, an erroneous finalizer called during a tail call leads to a heap-based buffer over-read.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> memcached not built with experimental proxy code, so vendored lua isn't built ccdm94> vulnerable function introduced by commit 14c3aa12b

criterions.comment: darktable: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
